# Assets structure for DRIFT ENTERPRISES

Place your product and category images inside these folders.  
You can overwrite or delete the `.gitkeep` files â€“ they only exist so the folders are tracked.

Top-level sections:
- `appliances/`
- `mobiles/`
- `electronics/`
- `tv/`
- `trending/`

Sub-categories are nested inside each section, for example:
- `mobiles/apple/`, `mobiles/vivo/`, `mobiles/oppo/`, `mobiles/realme/`, `mobiles/oneplus/`, `mobiles/motorola/`
- `tv/samsung/`, `tv/lg/`, `tv/mi/`, `tv/toshiba/`, `tv/realme/`, `tv/tcl/`, `tv/assembled-tv/`
